metadata.name: Network States
metadata.description:
In a world connected by wires and screens,  
Network states dictate our daily routines.  
We rely on the flow of data and information,  
A web of connections, a global nation.

But as we've learned, this system can be flawed,  
Centralized power can be easily clawed.  
By those who seek to control and dominate,  
Leaving the masses feeling small and fate.

That's where decentralization comes into play,  
A way to spread power and choice in a new way.  
No longer controlled by a single entity,  
Decentralization gives us all some immunity.

From the tyranny of the few who hold sway,  
Decentralization allows us to have our say.  
In how we communicate and share our thoughts,  
A network of networks, where everyone's brought.

Into the fold, to have a voice and a choice,  
Decentralization gives us all a voice.  
In a world that's constantly changing and shifting,  
It's a way to keep control and keep lifting.

Each other up, as we navigate this life,  
In a network of networks, free from strife.
